mapper.select: select cdy.status, count(*) totalCount from cor_delivery cdy where cdy.dr = 0 and cdy.tenant_id=#{tenantId} group by cdy.status

select cdy.id, cdy.order_no as orderNo, cdy.status, '' as label, cdy.recipient, cdy.recipient_address as recipientAddress, cdy.recipient_email as recipientEmail, cdy.recipient_tel as recipientTel, cdy.country_code as countryCode, cdy.parcel_quantity as parcelQuantity, cdy.house_info as houseInfo, cdy.goods_inventory as goodsInventory, cdy.latitude, cdy.longitude, cdy.created_time as createdTime, cdy.ata as deliveredTime, cd.id as driverId, cup.last_name as driverLastName, cup.first_name as driverFirstName, cup.tel_number_1 as driverTel, cts.license_plate as licensePlate, cts.scooter_id as scooterId, cts.longitule as scooterLng, cts.latitude as scooterLat, cts.tenant_id as tenantId, cdy.driven_mileage as mileage, cdy.eta as eatTime from cor_delivery cdy inner join cor_user_profile cup on cdy.deliverer_id = cup.user_id and cup.dr = 0 inner join cor_driver cd on cup.user_id = cd.user_id and cd.dr = 0 inner join cor_tenant_scooter cts on cdy.scooter_id = cts.scooter_id and cts.dr = 0 where cdy.dr = 0 and cdy.id=#{id} and cdy.tenant_id=#{tenantId}

select cd.id as driverId, cd.user_id as userId, cup.first_name as firstName, cup.last_name as lastName, count(delivery.deliveryId) as completeAmount from cor_driver cd inner join cor_user_profile cup on cd.user_id = cup.user_id left join (select deliverer_id as userId, id as deliveryId from cor_delivery where status in ('1', '2')) delivery on cd.user_id = delivery.userId where cd.tenant_id =#{tenantId} and cd.status ='1' group by driverId, userId, first_name, last_name

select scooter.scooter_id as id, scooter.latitude as lat, scooter.longitule as lng, driver.id as driverId, profile.FIRST_NAME as driverFirstName, profile.LAST_NAME as driverLastName, profile.picture as avatar from cor_tenant_scooter scooter left join cor_driver_scooter cds on cds.scooter_id = scooter.scooter_id and cds.dr = 0 left join cor_driver driver on cds.driver_id = driver.id and driver.dr = 0 and driver.status in (1, 2) left join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.USER_ID and profile.dr = 0 where scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId}

select driver.id as id, driver.user_id as userId, profile.picture as avatar, profile.first_name as driverFirstName, profile.last_name as driverLastName, cds.scooter_id as scooterId from cor_driver driver inner join cor_user_profile profile on driver.user_id = profile.USER_ID and profile.dr = 0 left join cor_driver_scooter cds on driver.id = cds.driver_id and cds.dr = 0 where driver.status = 1 and driver.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and driver.id=#{id} and cds.status = 1

select node.id as id, node.event as event, node.status as status, cup.user_id as driverUserId, cup.first_name as driverFirstName, cup.last_name as driverLastName, node.event_time as eventTime from cor_delivery_trace node inner join cor_user_profile cup on node.created_by = cup.user_id where node.delivery_id = #{id} and node.tenant_id = #{tenantId} and node.dr = 0 order by node.event_time asc

select scooter.scooter_id as scooterId, scooter.license_plate as scooterLicensePlate, scooter.longitule as lng, scooter.latitude as lat, cd.id as driverId, profile.FIRST_NAME as driverFirstName, profile.LAST_NAME as driverLastName, profile.PICTURE as driverPicture from cor_tenant_scooter scooter left join cor_driver_scooter cds on cds.scooter_id = scooter.scooter_id and cds.dr = 0 and cds.status = 1 left join cor_driver cd on cd.id = cds.driver_id and cd.dr = 0 and cd.status = 1 left join cor_user_profile profile on cd.user_id = profile.USER_ID and profile.dr = 0 where scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
and scooter.license_plate=#{licensePlate}

select cd.id as id, cup.first_name as driverFirstName, cup.last_name as driverLastName, cup.picture as avatar from cor_driver_scooter scooter inner join cor_driver cd on scooter.driver_id = cd.id and cd.dr = 0 inner join cor_user_profile cup on cd.user_id = cup.user_id and cup.dr = 0 where scooter.scooter_id = #{id} and scooter.status = 1 and scooter.tenant_id = #{tenantId}
